summary: A chronicle of Brittany Murphy's rise to fame in the 1990s, her struggles with self-esteem, and her tragic early death.
cast: Amanda Fuller|Sherilyn Fenn|Eric Petersen|Chloë Crampton|Adam Hagenbuch|Victoria Barabas|Dan Sachoff|Amy Davidson|Amy Danles|Karynn Moore|Alexis Simpson|Paul Elia|Stephen Holland|Kat Purgal|Dan J. Johnson|Zachary Stockdale|Bonnie Burroughs|Justin Phillip|James Adam Tucker|Colby French|Alberta Mayne|Brett Chapin|Angela Richardson|Americo Galli|Anna Sampson|Yatoya Toy|Amanda Worthy
title: Todo por un sueño
